CHAT.comment: Jessica 1. I love my Mom because she is speacil. I love my Mom because she takes care of me. 3. I love my Mom because she is a mom. 4. I love my Mom because she is a bag. <There are also little hearts drawn on the page around the writing.>

letter writing task is interrupted a few times by Chi's sisters. The sisters explain to Mot and EXPs about how a dog got run over. Mot does not seem very involved with the task except when Chi asks her how to spell a word. Chi chooses to write the letter to Mot and kept it a secret as to what she was writing about until she was all done. Chi wants to write the letter in all capitals but Mot discourages this. Chi asks Mot how to spell special and Mot spells it speacil. Chi comments how her writing is sloppy and Mot adds it is just like her fathers. Mot makes a sarcastic comments when she reads what Chi has written

u.a: tape stops and then starts again
puts different pencils and pens on the table
MOT and Sis tell EXP stories about dogs that have been run over; Chi signs her name at top of page while waiting for them to finish so she can start
MOT and Sis talking about someone outside
SIS goes out the door to look for SIS2
discussing what SIS2 was doing outside
gets up to look out window
MOT acts fairly disengaged at this point and lets Chi write on her own
